pkgmetadata.longdescription: Android Debug Bridge (ADB) daemon for embedded systems. This package provides the server-side daemon (adbd) that runs on the target device to enable ADB connections for debugging and development. Based on the Android platform system core with patches for Linux compatibility and embedded use cases.

use.flag: Build statically linked binary for minimal system dependencies
Enable secure authentication mode requiring password or key authentication
Enable shell access configuration and logcat utility
Enable TCP port configuration for network ADB connections
